scenarios.name: TechCorp IPO
scenarios.description: A hot new tech startup is going public
scenarios.openingStatement: Hey! I've got some insider info about TechCorp's upcoming IPO. This could be huge!

wordOfMouth: My buddy at the company says they're crushing their Q4 numbers
Rumor has it they're about to announce a major partnership
The CEO was spotted at Goldman Sachs last week - big deal coming!
newspaper: TechCorp Reports Record Revenue Growth in Q4
Industry Analysts Predict Strong IPO Performance

call.message: Great call! TechCorp's IPO was a huge success and the stock soared!

put.message: Ouch! TechCorp's IPO exceeded expectations. You missed out on big gains.

hold.message: Smart to wait and see. TechCorp did well, but you avoided the risk.

scenarios.name: MediPharm Clinical Trial
scenarios.description: A pharmaceutical company's drug trial results are about to be released
scenarios.openingStatement: I heard some concerning things about MediPharm's latest drug trial. This could go either way.

wordOfMouth: My friend in the lab says the trial data looks questionable
There are whispers about side effects in the test group
The FDA meeting got postponed - never a good sign
newspaper: MediPharm Trial Results Delayed by FDA
Concerns Raised Over Drug Safety Profile
MediPharm Stock Drops on Trial Uncertainty

call.message: Bad timing! MediPharm's trial results were disappointing and the stock tanked.

put.message: Excellent foresight! MediPharm's trial failed and you made a killing on the put!

hold.message: Wise decision to stay out. MediPharm's troubles would have hurt your portfolio.

scenarios.name: EnergyCorp Merger
scenarios.description: Two energy companies are rumored to be merging
scenarios.openingStatement: Big news in the energy sector! EnergyCorp and PowerMax might be joining forces.

wordOfMouth: The merger talks have been going on for months
Both companies' boards are meeting this week
My source says the deal is 90% done
newspaper: EnergyCorp and PowerMax in Advanced Merger Talks
Merger Could Create Energy Sector Giant

call.message: Nice work! The merger was announced and both stocks jumped significantly!

put.message: Wrong direction! The merger announcement sent stocks soaring, not falling.

hold.message: Conservative play. The merger went through but you avoided the volatility.
